title: News Briefs 18-01-2022
cleaned_text:
To help the Grail get bigger and better in 2022, please consider a $US1/month ‘voluntary subscription’ via our Patreon, or a one-off donation at PayPal.me/DailyGrail). Thanks for your support!
• Are the aliens us? UFOs may be piloted by time-traveling humans, book argues.
• Moon bats, Venusian dinosaurs, and the history of alien life.
• People’s ‘glitch in the Matrix’ experiences baffle the internet.
• Vast 4,500-year old network of ‘funerary avenues’ discovered in Saudi Arabia.
• The Liber Linteus: an Egyptian mummy wrapped in a cryptic message.
• Moderna starts human trials of mRNA vaccine for virus that likely causes multiple sclerosis.

Quote of the Day:

Through our scientific and technological genius we’ve made of this world a neighborhood. And now through our moral and ethical commitment we must make of it a brotherhood. We must all learn to live together as brothers – or we will all perish together as fools. This is the great issue facing us today.
